about.title: About Us
about.bodytext: Hello, I'm thankful that you connected on this website.
about.bodytext2: I'm from Germany but I can speak and understand English pretty good.
about.bodytext3: Please call me Caesar, I'm a graphicdesigner and developer. This Website is 100% authentic.
about.bodytext4: You can buy graphicdesigns from me, which I will design especially for you.
about.bodytext5: You have to discribe what you want to have, that I can do it as good as I can.
about.bodytext6: You can dicide between: logos, banners (twitter, Youtube...) Avatars and your own thoughts.
about.bodytext7: You can contact me on Socialmedia, go to Home to see it.
about.bodytext8: I really hope you like my website and like my designs. -Caesar
